name: CinderWoods
description:
Welcome to CinderWoods… You will burn. The only question is - how long will you survive?

CinderWoods is about surviving the oncoming forest fire as long as possible. Just running away is not a good option. Harvest resources of wood and stone and use them to construct fire barriers to give yourself a momentary reprieve, by slowing the spread. 

Barriers require 2 wood resources and 1 stone resource to build. Manage your resources by keeping a close eye on the counters… don’t get caught without a barrier to get behind.

Get a higher score by delaying the inevitable. The longer you make it and the less fire there is, the faster your score climbs.

Stop. Drop. And run!
